pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 te4 qu1

definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: He stands pledged to abolish slavery in Columbia (the district round Washington) under the conditions we have shown.
sentences.chinese: 他發誓要在現有的情況下廢除哥倫比亞特區的奴隸制。

sentences.english: The District of Columbia is coextensive with the city of Washington.
sentences.chinese: 哥倫比亞特區興華盛頓市有相等的範圍。

sentences.english: This one-day-old boy was born in Columbia, Maryland.
sentences.chinese: 上圖是在馬里蘭州哥倫比亞特區出生一天的男嬰。

sentences.english: Washington district of columbia --washington d. c.
sentences.chinese: 美國首都華盛頓全稱爲華盛頓哥倫比亞特區。

sentences.english: We're very pleased to have him in Washington, D.C.
sentences.chinese: 他住在華盛頓哥倫比亞特區，我們非常高興。
